item.title: 法国税务机关利用人工智能打击税务欺诈行为
item.description: 一位专门从事私人财富业务的律师表示，法国政府正在采取越来越严厉的手段来揭露税务欺诈行为。【原文：The French government is deploying increasingly aggressive methods to uncover tax fraud, according to a lawyer who specializes in private wealth.】

item.title: 白莲花 "热潮推动泰国岛屿四月酒店预订量增长
item.description: 据泰国政府称，四月份国际游客在宋干节假期的酒店预订量激增，苏梅岛（热播剧《白莲花》的拍摄地）的预订量比去年同期增长了 65%。【原文：Thailand saw a surge in hotel bookings by international visitors for the Songkran holiday in April, with the island of Koh Samui - filming location of the hit series White Lotus - recording a 65% increase from a year ago, according to the government.】

item.title: 英国通胀意外放缓提振降息希望
item.description: 英国通胀率在 2 月份意外降温，这为英国央行在 5 月份再次降息提供了更充分的理由，也为英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在本周三发表重要经济声明前提供了支持。【原文：UK inflation unexpectedly cooled in February, strengthening the case for the Bank of England to cut interest rates again in May and providing a boost for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves ahead of a key economic statement Wednesday.】

item.title: 贝恩收购意大利软件公司 Namirial 大部分股权
item.description: 贝恩资本同意从私募股权公司 Ambienta 收购 Namirial SpA 的多数股权。【原文：Bain Capital agreed to acquire a majority stake in Namirial SpA from private equity firm Ambienta.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）贷款后巴基斯坦经济增长快于预期
item.description: 巴基斯坦上一季度的经济增长速度超过预期，因为金融条件的放宽和降息促进了这个南亚国家的经济复苏。【原文：Pakistan’s economy grew faster than expected last quarter as easing financial conditions and rate cuts bolstered recovery for the South Asian nation.】

item.title: LG 印度首次公开募股的估值预期被认为有所降低
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在印度股市近期下跌之后，LG 电子公司印度分公司首次公开募股的估值可能低于此前预期。【原文：LG Electronics Inc.’s India unit may get a lower valuation than previously expected in its initial public offering, according to people familiar with the development, after the recent decline in the nation’s stock market.】

item.title: 英国 2 月通胀意外放缓
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The London Stock Exchange. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 在中国人工智能复兴之际，苹果公司首席执行官访问 DeepSeek 的故乡
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）访问了中国的人工智能中心杭州，这里是人工智能巨头 DeepSeek 的发源地，DeepSeek 以低于美国竞争对手的成本制造的模型震惊了世界。【原文：Apple Inc.’s Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook visited China’s artificial intelligence hub of Hangzhou, the home of AI sensation DeepSeek which shocked the world with its models built at a fraction of the cost of American rivals.】

item.title: 埃尔多安在令市场震惊的镇压行动中赢得特朗普赞誉
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普赞扬了土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan），为这个在镇压反对派的行动中面临一周国内抗议和外国资本外流的政府背书。【原文：US President Donald Trump praised Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, giving his endorsement to a government that’s faced a week of protests at home and an exodus of foreign capital amid a crackdown on the opposition.】

item.title: 以色列在叙利亚部署军队作为新防御理论的一部分
item.description: 头戴蓝盔的联合国维和人员大部分已不复存在，取而代之的是九个新基地中的数千名以色列士兵，他们的视野一直可以延伸到大马士革。以色列正在火山岩上挖出一条六米深（20 英尺）的壕沟，以阻挡任何滚向以色列的东西。【原文：The blue-helmeted United Nations peacekeepers are mostly gone, replaced by thousands of Israeli troops in nine new bases with vistas all the way to Damascus. A six-meter-deep (20-foot) trench is being dug out of the volcanic rock to trap anything rolling toward Israel.】

item.title: 德意志银行为 Blackstone 竞购马尔代夫水上飞机运营商 TMA 寻找贷款参与者
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，德意志银行正在评估潜在参与者对 2 亿美元贷款的兴趣，以支持 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is gauging interest from potential participants in a $200 million loan to support Blackstone Inc.’s bid for seaplane operator Trans Maldivian Airways Pvt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Grab 为收购 GoTo 寻求高达 20 亿美元的贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡乘车和外卖公司 Grab Holdings Ltd. 正在洽谈筹集高达 20 亿美元的贷款，以支持其对印尼竞争对手 GoTo Group Inc.【原文：Singaporean ride and delivery firm Grab Holdings Ltd. is in talks to raise a loan of as much as $2 billion to back its potential takeover of Indonesia-based rival GoTo Group Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织初步批准向巴基斯坦提供 20 亿美元贷款
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）准备分两次向巴基斯坦提供约 20 亿美元的贷款，这表明全球贷款方对巴基斯坦政府为重建脆弱的南亚经济而进行的经济改革充满信心。【原文：International Monetary Fund is poised to disburse about $2 billion to Pakistan in two separate loans, in a show of confidence by the global lender in the government’s economic reforms to rebuild the fragile South Asian economy.】

item.title: 媒体报道：越南允许马斯克的 "星链 "公司提供试点服务
item.description: 越南政府发表声明称，越南将允许埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司在该国提供卫星互联网服务，试点期为五年，最多可容纳 60 万用户。【原文：Vietnam will allow Elon Musk’s Starlink to provide satellite internet services in the country for a pilot period of five years, with a maximum of 600,000 subscribers, according to a government statement.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老基金在丑闻后抛弃慧科公司
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金已经出售了其在丑闻缠身的 WiseTech Global Ltd. 公司的股份，称该公司的管理没有达到预期。【原文：Australia’s largest pension fund has sold down its stake in scandal-plagued WiseTech Global Ltd., saying the company’s governance fell short of expectations.】

item.title: 瑞士金融警长挑战瑞银集团和银行业精英
item.description: 斯特凡-沃尔特（Stefan Walter）在负责瑞士金融监管机构的一年中，在他监管的银行家中声名鹊起。【原文：In the year since Stefan Walter has been in charge of Switzerland’s financial regulator, he’s made a name for himself among the bankers he oversees.】

。【原文：

item.title: 可可市场动荡提升了老式豆荚计数器的地位
item.description:
随着可可价格大幅上涨，巧克力公司和对冲基金希望深入了解可可的收成规模，因此荚果计数引起了更多关注。【原文：

Pod counting is drawing more interest as chocolate firms and hedge funds seek insight into harvest sizes in the wake of cocoa's massive rally.

】

item.title: 汇丰银行外包交易是一项充满风险的业务
item.description:
大型银行正在讨论从 Citadel Securities 等公司租用交易功能，但这样做可能得不偿失。【原文：

Big banks are talking about renting trading capabilities from firms like Citadel Securities, but the savings might not be worth it.

】

item.title: 风险加剧，捷克将再次暂停降息：决策指南
item.description: 由于国内通胀风险持续存在，全球紧张局势给经济前景蒙上阴影，捷克决策者可能会暂停降息。【原文：Czech policymakers will probably pause interest rate cuts as domestic inflation risks persist and global tensions cloud the economic outlook.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡总理预计 2028 年经济将脆弱不堪
item.description: 斯里兰卡总理表示，至少在未来两年内，斯里兰卡新政府的支出将受到限制，因为新政府希望在竞选时承诺的取消增税和其他紧缩措施与 30 亿美元救助计划规定的限额之间取得平衡。【原文：Sri Lanka’s new government will be restricted in how much it can spend for at least the next two years, the prime minister said, as it looks to balance campaign pledges to unwind tax increases and other austerity measures against limits set by its $3 billion bailout program.】

item.title: 拉布娃娃热潮推动流行超市利润增长一倍多
item.description: 流行玛特国际集团有限公司（Pop Mart International Group Ltd.）表示，由于其专利产品广受欢迎，该公司去年的利润增长了一倍多，今后将继续以北美和欧洲为重点扩大全球业务。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. said it will continue to expand its global footprint with focus on North America and Europe, after reporting its profit more than doubled last year thanks to the popularity of its patented products.】

item.title: 香港侨福避免贷款违约，计划商场再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港建筑商侨福集团有限公司（Parkview Group Ltd.）避免了一笔 9.4 亿美元贷款的违约，并正在与银行就这笔贷款进行再融资谈判。【原文：Hong Kong builder Parkview Group Ltd. has avoided a default on a $940 million loan and is in refinancing talks with banks over the facility, which backs a Beijing shopping mall complex, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴与宝马合作在中国开发汽车人工智能
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和德国宝马汽车公司将联手在中国生产汽车人工智能，这家科技巨头希望将其新兴产品货币化，并接触到更多客户。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and BMW AG will team up to produce AI for cars in China, as the tech giant looks to monetize its emerging products and reach more customers.】

item.title: 印尼大刀阔斧的改革为何令市场恐慌？
item.description: 自总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）10 月份上任以来，印尼股市一路下滑，到 3 月底，印尼盾跌至 1997-1998 年亚洲金融危机以来的最低水平，当时印尼得到了国际货币基金组织的救助。【原文：Since President Prabowo Subianto took office in October, Indonesia’s stock market has slumped and by late March the rupiah had tumbled to its lowest level since the 1997-1998 Asian financial crisis, when the country was bailed out by the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 福特斯库公司福雷斯特对中国保持乐观，铁矿石出现波动
item.description: 铁矿石在涨跌之间摇摆不定，原因是市场对钢铁减产存在不确定性，而且行业中坚安德鲁-福雷斯特（Andrew Forrest）表示希望中国认真支持本国经济。【原文：Iron ore swung between gains and losses on market uncertainty around steel output cuts and as industry stalwart Andrew Forrest expressed hope that China is serious about supporting its economy.】

item.title: 越南建议削减液化天然气、汽车和农产品关税
item.description: 越南财政部提出了一项削减包括液化天然气、汽车、木材和农产品在内的一系列产品优惠进口关税的建议，以避免美国关税迫在眉睫的威胁。【原文：Vietnam’s finance ministry has put forward a proposal to cut preferential import tariffs on a range of products including LNG, cars, wood, and agricultural products, as the nation seeks to avoid the imminent threat of US tariffs.】

item.title: 泰国总理在他信被审查后首次通过不信任投票
item.description: 泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）在议会的不信任投票中幸免于难，在为期两天的辩论中，反对派将矛头指向了她，指责她的父亲对政府的影响以及政府对经济的管理不善。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra survived a no-confidence vote in parliament after a two-day debate where the opposition targeted her over her father’s alleged influence on the government and its mismanagement of the economy.】

item.title: Mandiri 股息超出预期后印尼股市上涨
item.description: 在几家国有银行提高派息后，印尼基准股票指数上扬。【原文：Indonesia’s benchmark equity index advanced after several state-owned banks offered higher dividend payouts.】
